name: Breaking the Stigma
description: This series provides a platform for discussing important topics related to diversity and inclusion in the technology industry.

name: Level Up
description: Build your computer science skills with the help of mentors at our hands-on workshops. Bring your laptop and get ready to learn!

name: Tech Talk
description: Broaden your horizons and network with professionals who are happy to share insights from their journey in the fastest-changing industry today.

name: Town Hall
description: Impact your academic experience at our town halls, where students voice concerns and suggestions regarding courses, student life, and more!

name: Code for Cash
description: This semesterly event offers students the opportunity to learn new skills while competing to win prizes in a friendly, relaxed environment.

name: Coding 404
description: Error: coding not found! These social events are your chance to wind down and catch up with friends.
